sentences.sContent: He is confident in his ability to overcome all opposition with his personal charm.
sentences.sCn: 他自信有能力以个人魅力来化解一切反对力量。

sentences.sContent: The proposals have aroused the opposition of teachers.
sentences.sCn: 这些建议引起了教师们的反对。

sentences.sContent: Strong opposition resulted in rejection of the bill.
sentences.sCn: 在强烈反对下这项议案遭到否决。

sentences.sContent: Plans to turn the site into a £600 million leisure complex have met with stiff opposition.
sentences.sCn: 将该处改造成造价六亿英镑的综合性休闲大楼的计划遭到了激烈的反对。

sentences.sContent: Much public opposition to the new law remained.
sentences.sCn: 公众对这项新法律仍存在普遍的反对情绪。

sentences.sContent: Workers found themselves in opposition to local interests.
sentences.sCn: 工人们发现自己与当地人的利益存在冲突。
